column6:
"THE DEVIL INSIDE" PART 3 (OF 4),2004,12
Nightcrawler has enlisted the help of his one-time girlfriend, Amanda Sefton-a.k.a. MAGIK-to get to the bottom of the mystery of the 13 dead children. Can she defend him against the forces of the supernatural that appear to be at work, or are they both out of their league?
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | inker:Wayne Faucher | penciller (cover):Greg Land | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller:Darick Robertson
